benchmark_details.name: CityEQA-EC
benchmark_details.overview: CityEQA-EC is the first benchmark dataset for Embodied Question Answering in urban environments, featuring 1,412 human-annotated tasks across six categories, grounded in a realistic 3D urban simulator.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate embodied agents' performance on CityEQA tasks and promote advancements in urban spatial intelligence.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The benchmark primarily focuses on object-centric question-answering tasks and does not cover dynamic events or social interactions.

data.source: Collected from the EmbodiedCity 3D urban simulator.
data.annotation: Annotated by five human annotators through observation of 3D simulated environments.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the correctness of answers, the distance to the target object, and the average time steps taken to complete tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher QAA indicates better performance, lower NE denotes successful navigation, and reduced MTS reflects efficiency.
methodology.baseline_results: PMA achieved 60.73% of human accuracy in answering questions.
methodology.validation: Performance is assessed against five types of baselines, including human performance.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: No identifiable information or private properties were included in the data collection process.
